company.title: About Us
company.subtitle: Love, captured behind the scenes — in real time.
description: Vivah BTS is a wedding content creation studio dedicated to turning real moments into beautiful digital memories. We specialize in live social media coverage, cinematic reels, aesthetic stories, and same-day edits that let your wedding shine online while the celebration is still happening.

From intimate glances to grand entries, from haldi laughter to vidaai tears — our team captures emotions, energy, and elegance with a modern storytelling approach. We don’t just document weddings, we curate experiences that are personal, stylish, and truly unforgettable.
At Vivah BTS, every couple has a unique story — and we make sure the world sees it beautifully.
